title.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Holden Colorado (jun2012 on) RG & Z71 2.8L Diesel – ProVent Oil Catch Can Kit OS-PROV-19

content.rendered:
Western Filters Provent Oil Catch Can Kit suits:

Holden Colorado RG (jun 2012 on)

Holden Colorado Z71 models

All fitted with the 2.8L CRD Turbo charged engine.

This Western Filters kit uses the Mann+Hummel Provent 200 – the leading catch can / crankcase breather on the market ! This unit will stop all contaminates going back into your air intake manifold and we believe remove the need to block off your EGR valve, as there will be no oily residue in the system.

The installation location within the engine bay is right behind the ECU bracket (on the passenger side) in front of the firewall.

** WILL NOT FIT ! **

If you have a Pre-Filter Fuel Separator already installed.

The Mann Provent replaceable element will need to be changed between 40,000 to 50,000 kms mark.

Provent Kit Includes:

:: Provent Unit

:: Stainless Steel Bracket

:: Top & Bottom Hoses

:: Drain Kit

Download Installation Instructions >

excerpt.rendered: WESTERN FILTERS Holden Colorado (jun2012 on) RG & Z71 2.8L Diesel – ProVent Oil
